../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 986 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 1054 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 911 For communication DTC "LIN Bus - no communication" (which can be monitored also while s_KL_15 == 0 provided that all slaves on the LIN are KL30 supplied) CRoute shall only enable LIN communication diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTC) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when and while
all the following conditions are true (logical AND) Related LIN is active (applicative schedule) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed DTC "local databus - electrical failure" is not active for the related LIN Enabling by (s_NWDF*==1, if all nodes on this bus are KL30 supplied OR s_NWDF==1, if at least one node on this bus is KL15 supplied) at least 2 slaves are coded on this LIN according to Sollverbauliste
Note: Basically s_NWDF==1 already implies s_KL_15==1 and supply voltage range ok, and s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok. The information whether the slaves are KL30 supplied can be derived from the Enable condition "s_NWDF*==1" in GW_Ereignisspeicher for the related slave timeout DTCs.
Note (KPM7741694, VWMEB-20751): The linked STR LIN_2255 requests 2 or more slaves as precondition. However, 03_Verbauliste STR GW_VL_147 request at least 1 slave as precondition. GATEWAY-5783 created for Mr. Lasser -> VW Mr. Hahn reply "implementation according to LIN LAH is sufficient"
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10240 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrIsLinNodeTimeoutDTCActive ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_DEM_Interface.h line 254 Requirement is satisfied here: ErrResetTDiagStartT ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_Start_Diag_Timer.h line 243 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_DEM_Interface.c line 188 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_DEM_Interface.c line 226 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_ERRHDL_MQB_Rport_ZAS_Kl_15 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Start_Diag_Timer.c line 321 Requirement is satisfied here: CentAND_GetNwdf2 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Start_Diag_Timer.c line 354 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_DEM_Interface.c.test line 762 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Start_Diag_Timer.c.test line 436 For communication DTC "LIN Bus - no communication":
CRoute shall restart tDIAG_START when one of the following events occurs Related LIN is getting active s_KL_15 changes from 0->1 Supply voltage decreases below UNWDF_HIGH-0,5V Supply voltage increases above UNWDF_LOW+0,5V Enabling changes s_NWDF* == 0->1 DTC "local databus - electrical fault" is no more active (for the relevant LIN bus) DTC "Local data-bus: no communication" is no more active for the related LIN
AND all conditions in SWR_ICAS1_GW_10240 except tDIAG_START are true.
Note: Basically s_NWDF*==0->1 / s_NWDF==0->1 already implies supply voltage range got/is valid
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10241 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

- Node message received or encoding removed, it shall set in time 0 s the DTC 0x229431 as Not Qualified.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3396 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10066
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrHdlEnableConditionsRelatedToCodingUpdate ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_If.h line 887 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_If.c.test line 795 When a message is received with set obsolete bit (<message>_alt==1) for a specified number of receive cycles, i.e. when time tC_MSG_TIMEOUT elapses without having received the monitored message with reset obsolete bit, considering 10% of the slow cycle time as tolerance, then CRoute shall set to active the related DTC, provided that
1) NWD is enabled as indicated in SWR_ICAS1_GW_10001 or SWR_ICAS1_GW_10004. AND 2) the other enable conditions (e.g. codings) are true.
The relevant conditions will be defined in chapter "Diagnostic Trouble Codes".
Note: In Ereignisspeicher usually tC_MSG_TIMEOUT is defined in multiples of the slow cycle time tMSG_CYCLE. If there are no DTCs with _alt signal, then this requirement is also fulfilled.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10066 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: #TBD# ASIL: QM

CRoute shall only enable LIN communication diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTCs) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when and while
all the following conditions are true (logical AND)
Related LIN is active (applicative schedule) DTC "local databus - electrical failure" is not active for the related LIN DTC "Local data-bus: no communication" is not active for the related LIN (or this DTC is n/a due to <2 slaves) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed Enabling by s_NWDF*==1
Note: Basically s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok
Note: According to GATEWAY-4425, in 616_Sensor_Sirene_DWA_ICAS1_Ereignisspeicher VW did not use "s_NWDF*" to describe, that monitoring shall be done independent from KL15, but "auch wenn s_KL_15 == aus"

"s_NWDF*==1" (monitoring at KL15 on+off):
CRoute shall restart tDIAG_START when one of the following events occurs: LIN is getting active s_KL_15 changes from 0->1 Supply voltage decreases below UNWDF_HIGH-0,5V Supply voltage increases above UNWDF_LOW+0,5V Enabling changes s_NWDF* == 0->1 DTC "local databus - electrical fault" is no more active (for the relevant LIN bus) DTC "Local data-bus: no communication" is no more active for the related LIN
AND all conditions in SWR_ICAS1_GW_10213 except tDIAG_START are true.
Note: Enabling by s_NWDF*==1 does not consider whether a slave is supplied by KL15 or KL30. In order to be on the safe side tDIAG_START is restarted independent from whether a slave is supplied by KL15 or KL30 - same as for CAN ECUs. (LIN_2445 would only restart tDIAG_START due to KL15 on when a slave is supplied by Kl15). Basically s_NWDF*==0->1 already implies supply voltage range got/is valid
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10214 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 911 For communication DTC "LIN Bus - no communication" (which can be monitored also while s_KL_15 == 0 provided that all slaves on the LIN are KL30 supplied) CRoute shall only enable LIN communication diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTC) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when and while
all the following conditions are true (logical AND) Related LIN is active (applicative schedule) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed DTC "local databus - electrical failure" is not active for the related LIN Enabling by (s_NWDF*==1, if all nodes on this bus are KL30 supplied OR s_NWDF==1, if at least one node on this bus is KL15 supplied) at least 2 slaves are coded on this LIN according to Sollverbauliste
Note: Basically s_NWDF==1 already implies s_KL_15==1 and supply voltage range ok, and s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok. The information whether the slaves are KL30 supplied can be derived from the Enable condition "s_NWDF*==1" in GW_Ereignisspeicher for the related slave timeout DTCs.
Note (KPM7741694, VWMEB-20751): The linked STR LIN_2255 requests 2 or more slaves as precondition. However, 03_Verbauliste STR GW_VL_147 request at least 1 slave as precondition. GATEWAY-5783 created for Mr. Lasser -> VW Mr. Hahn reply "implementation according to LIN LAH is sufficient"
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10240 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

CRoute shall only enable LIN diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTCs) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when
all the following conditions are true (logical AND) Related LIN is active (applicative schedule) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed DTC "local databus - electrical failure" is not active for the related LIN DTC "Local data-bus: no communication" is not active for the related LIN Enabling by s_NWDF*==1
Otherwise CRoute shall suppress storing as active those DTCs.
Note Basically s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok Defect bits can only be received when there is no timeout.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10289 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

When the software receives from the GW signal:
Each transmission message of LIN slaves is individually monitored by the LIN master - Eventtriggered frames are ignored.
If the LIN master for time TQ recognizes one or more (but not all) transmission frames of a LIN slaves as missing or one, more or all transmission frames as faulty, the DTC 0x150037 shall be set as Qualified.
Failure criteria: - LIN slave sends set Response Error bit due to errors in the transmitting or receiving frames - LIN master receives one, several or all the transmission frames of a Slaves faulty (wrong checksum / false DLC)
Event log entry is not triggered IF: - LIN slave sends the defined signal value "error" in one or multiple signals - All LIN frames of the SBUs received correctly (fully && checksum I.O.)
Note: Precondition: Bus "LIN-Energie"==active && s_NWDF*==1.
Only valid if the conditions for "Local data error electrical error" and "Local data bus no communication" on the same LIN bus segment and "Slave no communication" for the same LIN slave are not met.
BDM coded
The frame BDM_LiIon2 may be evaluated only if s_valBatTechAnp = 6 ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3423 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10264
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrLinFramesErrorCyclicMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.h line 110 Requirement is satisfied here: TOOL_NUMBER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 503 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 652 If CRoute detects that a certain coded slave (Sollverbauliste) does not provide a response for the time period TQ_timeout, although CRoute successfully transmits LIN headers, then CRoute shall assume that there is an slave timeout.
As defined in LIN_790 time TQ_timeout is 4s in general, but the actual value is provided per DTC in GW_Ereignisspeicher.
In case a slave transmits more than one message according to the LIN schedule then only the loss of all its messages shall lead to setting a "slave - no communication" DTC to active if not defined otherwise in Ereignisspeicher.
Note: Event triggered frames shall not be considered in this monitoring (n/a in CRoute)
Note: In case of several frames sent by one slave it is possible to monitor more than one message.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10264 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10265
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrLinFramesErrorCyclicMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.h line 111 Requirement is satisfied here: TOOL_NUMBER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 504 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 653 When the failure condition (no response) is getting active CRoute shall start timer TQ_timeout for the related slave / frame.
When the failure condition is getting passive (one correct response) CRoute shall reset and stop timer TQ_timeout for the related slave / frame.
As soon as the TQ_timeout elapses CRoute shall set the related DTC to active.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10265 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.para:

When the software receives from the GW signal:
Broadcast message of a LIN slave(MFLs_01) is monitored by the master - Eventtriggered frames are ignored. Recognizes the master for time TQ transmission frame of a LIN slave as missing or faulty then the error enter occur on the transmission frame.
Failure criteria: - LIN slave sends Set Response Error bit due to error in the transmit or receive frame - Master receives transmission frame of a slave error (wrong checksum) - Master receives transmission frame of a slave error (false DLC)
The following errors do not cause this event log entry: - LIN slave sends the defined signal value "error" in one or multiple signals
If the LIN frame of the control unit received correctly (fully && checksum I.O.), it shall set the DTC 0x150031 as Not Qualified.

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10294
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrLinSlavesHandleDemEvents ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/inc/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.h line 85 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 469 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c.test line 360 If CRoute detects that a certain coded (Sollverbauliste) slave provides a response with a set defect bit for the time period TQ_defective, then CRoute shall assume that there is slave defect.
As defined in LIN_834 time TQ_defective is 3s in general, but the actual value is provided per DTC in GW_Ereignisspeicher.
Note: A slave might provide more than 1 defective bit, or none.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10294 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 986 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 1054 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 911 For communication DTC "LIN Bus - no communication" (which can be monitored also while s_KL_15 == 0 provided that all slaves on the LIN are KL30 supplied) CRoute shall only enable LIN communication diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTC) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when and while
all the following conditions are true (logical AND) Related LIN is active (applicative schedule) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed DTC "local databus - electrical failure" is not active for the related LIN Enabling by (s_NWDF*==1, if all nodes on this bus are KL30 supplied OR s_NWDF==1, if at least one node on this bus is KL15 supplied) at least 2 slaves are coded on this LIN according to Sollverbauliste
Note: Basically s_NWDF==1 already implies s_KL_15==1 and supply voltage range ok, and s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok. The information whether the slaves are KL30 supplied can be derived from the Enable condition "s_NWDF*==1" in GW_Ereignisspeicher for the related slave timeout DTCs.
Note (KPM7741694, VWMEB-20751): The linked STR LIN_2255 requests 2 or more slaves as precondition. However, 03_Verbauliste STR GW_VL_147 request at least 1 slave as precondition. GATEWAY-5783 created for Mr. Lasser -> VW Mr. Hahn reply "implementation according to LIN LAH is sufficient"
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10240 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 1055 For all LIN electrical failure DTCs
CRoute shall only enable LIN diagnostics (i.e. allow storing as active those DTCs) after all enable conditions are fulfilled, i.e. when
all the following conditions are true (logical AND) Related LIN is active (any schedule) Supply voltage range ok: UNWDF_LOW < supply voltage < UNWDF_HIGH tDIAG_START for this LIN bus has elapsed Enabling by s_NWDF*==1
Otherwise CRoute shall suppress storing as active those DTCs.
Note Basically s_NWDF*==1 already implies supply voltage range ok
Note: LIN Electrical Failures could also be detected when a schedule different from the applicative schedule is active. Flash schedule is period too. In the STR there is no clear requirement. SW should tell, what is easier to implement - any schedule or applicative schedule.

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10259
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetLINGlobalTimeoutDEMCond ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c line 252 Requirement is satisfied here: TOOL_NUMBER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c line 498 Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetLinGlobalTimeout ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 367 Requirement is satisfied here: TOOL_NUMBER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 673 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Enable_Conditions.c.test line 695 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 912 When headers could be sent but no responses were received on the related bus for a specified time, i.e. when time tGLOBAL_TIMEOUT elapses without having received any monitored message (response), considering 10% of tGLOBAL_TIMEOUT as tolerance, then the CRoute shall set to active the related DTC, provided that
1) NWD is enabled on a bus as indicated by all conditions in SWR_ICAS1_GW_10240 and 2) the other enable conditions (e.g. codings) are true for the relevant LIN bus. and 3) at least 2 slaves are coded for the relevant LIN bus according to Sollverbauliste
For qualification of Global Timeout CRoute shall consider any message which is monitored for message timeout DTC on the relevant LIN bus.
The relevant additional conditions shall be defined in chapter "Diagnostic Trouble Codes", if there are any. According to Ereignisspeicher tGLOBAL_TIMEOUT on LIN is 3500ms.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10259 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20795
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetLinGlobalTimeout ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 369 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 914 0x100256 - Lokaler Databus 6 no communication
DTC ID: 0x100256
Enabling Conditions (Preconditions): Bus system activated. Entry only if two or more LIN slaves are installed and encoded on the bus segment. Entry only for KL15=EIN, if the LIN slaves on the bus segment are not uniformly provided by KL30 or KL15. Entry only if the conditions for "Local Date of Electrical Errors" on the same bus segment are not met. (Bussystem aktiviert. Eintrag nur, falls zwei oder mehr LIN-Slaves am Bussegment verbaut und codiert sind. Eintrag nur bei KL15=EIN, wenn die LIN-Slaves am Bussegment nicht einheitlich durch KL30 oder durch KL15 vorsorgt sind. Eintrag nur, falls die Bedingungen für "Lokaler Databus elektrischer Fehler" am gleichen Bussegment nicht gegeben sind.)
Signals: n/a
Event Failed Timeout: 3500 ms Event Passed Timeout: 0 s
Unlearn: Counter / Eraseable
Priority Level: 4
Additional Environmental Data: n/a
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20795 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20781
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetLinGlobalTimeout ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 368 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 913 0x100256 - Lokaler Databus 6 no communication
When the software receives from the GW signal:
- Das Gateway sendet Botschaften, aber empfängt none Botschaften., it shall set the DTC 0x100256 as Qualified,
- LIN empfängt Botschaft, it shall set the DTC 0x100256 as Not Qualified.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20781 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10272
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetImplausibleDTC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 413 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 553 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 705 If CRoute detects that - a certain coded (Sollverbauliste) slave provides ResponseError==1 OR - one, several or all send frames of one Slave are faulty (wrong checksum) OR - for slaves which have more than one frame and several but not all of the frames of the slave have wrong DLC
for the time period TQ_implausible, although it successfully transmits LIN headers, then CRoute shall assume that there is a communication problem with the LIN slave.
The table in SWR_ICAS1_GW_10104 defines when to detect "Slave xxx no communication" or "Slave xxx implausible frame" in case of 2 monitored LIN frames (including mixed situations).
As defined in LIN_810 time TQ_implausible is 4,5s in general, but the actual value to be implemented is provided per DTC in Ereignisspeicher!
Note: Event triggered frames shall not be considered in this monitoring (n/a in CRoute) Some slaves do not provide ResponseError. It is not possible to distinguish implausible from timeout error in case of wrong DLC for nodes which have only one frame and if all of the frames of the node have wrong DLC. In this case node timeout will be set.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10272 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10273
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetImplausibleDTC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 414 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 554 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 706 When the failure condition (ResponseError=1 received) is getting active, CRoute shall start timer TQ_implausible for the related slave / frame.
When the failure condition is getting passive (one correct response, with ResponseError=0), CRoute shall reset and stop timer TQ_implausible for the related slave / frame.
As soon as the TQ_implausible elapses CRoute shall set the related DTC to active.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10273 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10275
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetImplausibleDTC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 415 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c line 555 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Lin_Frame_Errors_Detection.c.test line 707 CRoute must not set these "slave - implausible frame" DTCs when for this slave a "slave - no communication" DTC is already active.

ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10275 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10297
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrLinSlaveEMHLRHandleDemEvents ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 152 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_ERRHDL_MQB_Rport_bl_DCAC_ErrorGueltigkeit ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 486 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c.test line 392 If a defect bit plus a related error valid bit are defined:
defect bit error valid bit CRoute reaction 0 1 Reset TQ_defective 0 0 no reaction 1 1 Start TQ_defective 1 0 invalid, no reaction
When the failure condition (defect bit ==1 and error valid bit == 1 for this DTC) is getting active CRoute shall start timer TQ_defective for the related slave.
When the failure condition is getting passive (defect bit ==0 and error valid bit == 1 for this DTC) CRoute shall reset and stop timer TQ_defective for the related slave.
As soon as the TQ_defective elapses CRoute shall set the related DTC to active.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10297 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10092
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrCanSlaveMFLhandleDemEvents ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 403 Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSlavesCheckSignal ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 521 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c.test line 570 CRoute shall qualify an Error Value DTC (i.e. set the related DTC to active) if a signal having an error value is continuously received for the qualification time defined in GW_Ereignisspeicher for this DTC. Provided that the other enable conditions (e.g. codings) are true for the relevant CAN bus.
The relevant conditions will be defined in chapter "Diagnostic Trouble Codes" SWR_ICAS1_GW_3306, if there are any.

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10093
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrCanSlaveMFLhandleDemEvents ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 404 Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSlavesCheckSignal ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c line 522 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Slaves_Defect_Detection.c.test line 571 Resetting condition for the event memory entry related to the received error value: Instead of the corresponding error value, valid data is received.
When any signal which is monitored for error values is received having a valid value CRoute shall
1) set the related DTC to passive.
2) reset the qualification time/counter for this DTC I.e. the qualification time shall be retriggered directly after each reception of any valid signal in the PDU on that CAN bus. (i.e. the de-qualification time is 0ms)
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_10093 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: #TBD# ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3308
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetOrResetVoltageErrorDTC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Voltage_Out_Of_Range_Error.c line 123 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Voltage_Out_Of_Range_Error.c.test line 309 0x000501 - Supply Voltage - Upper Limit Exceeded
When the software receives from the GW signal regarding:
1: Qualifying time (tQ), 2: Function Restriction, 3: Overvoltage according to the description in the chapter 2.18.6.2.2.2.2, it shall set the DTC 0x000501 as Qualified,
If the Voltage is in acceptable range, according to the description in the chapter 2.18.6.2.2.2.2, it shall set the DTC 0x000501 as Not Qualified.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3308 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3310
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ErrSetOrResetVoltageErrorDTC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/src/ErrHdl_Voltage_Out_Of_Range_Error.c line 125 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/ERRHDL_MQB/c/test/swut/ErrHdl_Voltage_Out_Of_Range_Error.c.test line 311 0x000511 - Impairment Due To Overvoltage
When the software receives from the GW signal:
1: Qualifying time (tQ), 2: Function Restriction, 3: Overvoltage according to the description in the chapter 2.18.6.2.2.2.2, it shall set the DTC 0x000511 as Qualified,
If the Voltage is in acceptable range, according to the description in the chapter 2.18.6.2.2.2.2, (AND/OR) Function Restriction is no longer available, it shall set the DTC 0x000511 as Not Qualified.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_3310 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM
